info.title: re_nsyshid
info.author: deReeperJosh
info.details:
re_nsyshid is a plugin that overrides calls to the nsyshid.rpl library, allowing you to emulate USB Toys-to-Life USB peripheral devices.

Full usage details can be found here:
https://github.com/deReeperJosh/re_nsyshid#usage

changelog:
v0.4.4
Fixes Skylander Creation, where all UIDS were just 0000 instead of a random number

v0.4.3
-Give re_nsyshid a Website! by @deReeperJosh in #35
-FS Utils Read/Write fix by @deReeperJosh in #36

v0.4.2
- Use Wii U FS to Read/Write Figure Dumps by @deReeperJosh in #31

v0.4.1
